thread.title: Spotlight on: Sebastian Silva, Archbishop Wood, LB
thread.title_full: Spotlight on: Sebastian Silva, Archbishop Wood, LB

title: Spotlight on: Sebastian Silva, Archbishop Wood, LB
text:
See all travel deals Â» Posted: Friday, October 2, 2015, 3:01 AM 
With his rugged play at middle linebacker, Sebastian Silva has played a key role in Archbishop Wood's 4-0 start. He recovered a pair of fumbles in a 48-6 triumph over West Catholic last Friday at Northeast. 
The 5-foot-11, 215-pound senior registered a team-high nine tackles, including seven solos, in a 44-30 win over Simon Gratz on Sept. 12. 
A week earlier, Silva posted 11 first-half stops, with six solos, and recovered a fumble in a 62-21 victory against Allentown (N.J.) 
Silva, who also sees time at fullback, has drawn interest from Bryant, Bucknell, Colgate, Columbia, Penn, and Wagner, among others. More coverage
